arguments.template: <vxform-private-tree [data]="treeData" [selectType]="selectType" [selectData]="selectData" [tag]="tag"></vxform-private-tree>

<vxform-private-table
 [tableIndex]="query.pageIndex"
 [tableSize]="query.pageSize"
 [tableTotal]="query.total"
 [header]="header"
 [body]="body"
 [check]="check"
 [action]="action"
 [checkid]="checkid" 
 (checkChangeEvent)="checkChange($event)"
 (pageIndexEvent)="pageIndexChange($event)" >
</vxform-private-table>
